https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to this live paper resource item.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI.label: Iri
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI.name: IRI

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB._instruction: Add the web service or organization that hosts this live paper resource item.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB.description: Reference to an organization that provides facilities and services for something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB.label: Hosted by
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB.name: hostedBy

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO._instruction: Add the live paper section this live paper resource item is part of.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.label: Is part of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this live paper resource item.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name
